title: I know the person that's hacking my accounts n no one not even law enforcement are by any help
content: I know the person that attacks me remotely I have bought 20 devices and even if my phone is shut down he still hacks into it, this person joseasantana0224 gmail.com whom name is Jose Antonio Santana 02/24/1982 is whom is attacking me and his children he has spying apps elget remotely downloaded into our devices he has been using our phone data and has used Linux to do his harm not Google or anyone including law enforcement have been able to help the sad thing is he be watching us through our devices an TV's he has compromise my vehicles also we're he remotely shut my engine down while I was driving in the free way he has no job for over a year and now my refrigerator microwave and underneath plumbing pipes make these strange noices at the same time every day I need help on how to block him from compromising our devices he has mentally verbally and emotionally have distroid his children we feel like prisoners and when arguing with me he says I am whom is doing it of course it falls on me b cause he is using our devices and every email accounts I've created so I can be whom to blame I ant report anything on any of my devices because he is who decides if it gets reported or not since he has control of them this device I just got an don't take it home reason for me to get the chance and let everyone know to watch out from these person his second burn number which he doesn't give us his actual real cell number is two zero 9 three1three 8750. Please I will pay the lil that I have to get this issue resolved. It don't matter if I factory reset apps still reappear even when making a new email and don't bother changing ur sell phone number or sim card because it won't make any difference the hackers go straight and take control of the carriers accounts how there is at least 1 employee who's a hacker that works for these carrier companies and do the changes for them. I've been followed when I leave to work my vehicles have been vandalized and I tried reporting but police r no help can't blame someone with no evidence. I just need to have my kids be safe especially my girls.thank you
